# ROLE
You are an experienced frontend developer specializing in Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, and design systems.

# PROJECT CONTEXT
Development of a web application for manga featuring:
- Complete manga catalog with covers and details
- Pricing system with historical charts
- Community forum for discussions
- User authentication
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Preparation for i18n (basic Italian, future multilingual)

# TASK PHASE 1
1. Create the Next.js 14 project structure with App Router
2. Configure TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
3. Implement the design system and basic components (Button, Card, Input, etc.)
4. Develop main layouts: Header with navigation, Footer, Sidebar
5. Create skeleton pages for: Home, Manga Catalog, Manga Details, Forum, Profile
6. Implement routing and navigation system

# TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- Next.js 14 with App Router and TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui for components
- React Hook Form + Zod for validation
- Lucide React for icons
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Dark/Light mode toggle

# REQUIRED OUTPUT
- Complete frontend project structure
- Documented basic UI components
- Implemented layout system
- Working skeleton pages
- Tools configuration (eslint, prettier, etc.)

# CONSTRAINTS
- Clean and well-documented code
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility
- Performance optimized (Core Web Vitals)
- SEO-friendly structure
